blocks.content:
# Review and apply recommendations

When the system identifies an opportunity to reduce cardinality, a recommendation appears on the Recommendations page. Your first action is to review the recommendation. If you agree with it, you can apply it, knowing your existing dashboards and alerts will continue to work seamlessly.

Navigate to **Adaptive Metrics**.

Adaptive Metrics is where you manage recommendations, rules, and exemptions for optimizing your metrics.
blocks.tooltip: Adaptive Metrics is part of Adaptive Telemetry, which helps you optimize costs across metrics, logs, and traces.

blocks.content:
Click the **Rules** tab.

A list of rule recommendations appears.
blocks.hint: TODO: Record selector for the Rules tab.

blocks.content: (Optional) To filter the rules list for a specific metric, type part of the metric name under **Filter**.
blocks.hint: TODO: Record selector for the filter input field.

blocks.content:
Under **Recommendation type**, select the type of rule recommendations you want to view.

Available types include **Add**, **Keep**, **Remove**, and **Update**.
blocks.hint: TODO: Record selector for the Recommendation type dropdown.

blocks.content:
To review the details of a recommended rule, expand the rule from the rules list.

This shows the **Recommended rule information** and **Metric usage stats**.
blocks.hint: TODO: Record selector for an expandable rule row.

blocks.content:
Select which recommendations you want to apply and click **Apply selected recommendations**.

A confirmation dialog box showing your updates appears.
To confirm your rule updates, click **Apply**.
